mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL_COUNT , number , writer , subject , contents , created , password FROM (SELECT a.number , a.writer , a.subject , a.contents , date_format(a.created, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS created , a.password , ( @rank := @rank + 1) AS LEVEL_COUNT FROM board a, ( SELECT @rank := 0 ) AS b order by a.number) M WHERE LEVEL_COUNT BETWEEN (#{list_count_int}-1)*10+1 AND #{list_count_int}*10
SELECT number , writer , subject , contents , date_format(created, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS created , password FROM board WHERE number = #{number}
SELECT IF(count(number)/10 < 1, 1, count(number)/10+1) as board_count FROM board
mapper.insert: insert into board(writer, subject, contents, created, password ) value (#{writer}, #{subject}, #{contents}, NOW(), #{password})
